definitions.definition: To render motionless ; to stop moving or stop from moving.
examples: It is best to immobilize the injury until a doctor can examine it.

definitions.definition: To modify a surface such that things will not stick to it
To tie up a capital : make a capital investment that makes that capital unavailable.
examples: Don't immobilize your capital in aging accounts.

main_definition: To render motionless ; to stop moving or stop from moving.
secondary_definitions: To modify a surface such that things will not stick to it
( finance ) To tie up a capital : make a capital investment that makes that capital unavailable.
